renouveler.title: Residency renewal application
renouveler.stateUnchange:
I want to extend my residency without status change

(For instance : I extend my study)
renouveler.stateChange:
I want to extend my residency and change my status

(For instance : I change from student status to worker status)

etudier.title: Student residency renewal application
etudier.page.title: Student residency renewal application
etudier.step.title: 5 steps for your application

identity.step.long: Verify your civil status and personal information

etudier.preparationText:
To complete your application, you must be in possession :

  • a certificate of registration or pre-enrollment in a French school,
  • proof of sufficient financial resources, or greater than or equal to 615 â‚¬ monthly (grant certificate, bank statement, pay stubs or proof of support by a guarantor),
  • in case of change of civil status , a valid passport and an extract of your birth certificate with filiation or a full copy of your birth certificate,
  • in case of change of address, proof of address,

All supporting documents must be accompanied, where appropriate, a translation into French by a certified translator interpreter near an appellate court.

Find a certified translator interpreter
